name: intercomparison
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of comparing each member of a group with every other member: An intercomparison of the four machines showed that they have similar performance characteristics. Computers can be a vital tool for document inter-comparison.
More examplesFewer examplesIntercomparison experiments should be performed by different groups around the world.The paper presents an intercomparison of departments participating in the trial.We carried out an inter-comparison of a recently introduced international standard with prior methods.
